subject: Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Football
Colleges and Universities
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit, filed by the person known as Victim 1 at Sandusky’s trial, said university officials made deliberate decisions not to report Sandusky to authorities.
snippet: A lawsuit, filed by the person known as Victim 1 at Sandusky’s trial, said university officials made deliberate decisions not to report Sandusky to authorities.
